InstructionData.Title: Life Support
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: alias GasSensor d0​ alias O2Valve d1​ alias CO2Valve d2​ alias N2Valve d3​ alias OverPressure d4​ alias pressure r0​ # room pressure​ alias partial r1 # partial pressure of element​ alias ratio r2 # ratio of element​ start:​ yield​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ slt r6 101.325 pressure​ s OverPressure On r6​ # co2 regulation​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt r6 partial 0.2​ s CO2Valve On r6​ # oxygen regulation​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt r6 partial 22​ s O2Valve On r6​ # nitrogen regulation​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt r6 partial 79​ s N2Valve On r6​ j start
